title: Lynda - Delivering Employee Feedback with Dr.Todd Dewett
description:
[b]Lynda - Delivering Employee Feedback with Dr.Todd Dewett [/b]

Subject:  Business 

1h 7m Appropriate for all Feb 20, 2014 | Uploaded in Feb 12, 2015 by 2boweb


 
In this course, author Todd Dewett helps you identify ways to give both positive and negative feedback to employees. Learn how to create a culture driven by meaningful feedback and deliver coaching and suggestions to help employees stretch and grow.
